title: SHQ Kepsek Tracker â€” Replace logo assets and apply consistently across header, dashboards, and login

requirements.summary: Create/replace the generated static branding assets (icon + wide logo) derived from ee.png using the exact filenames expected by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/assets/generated/shq-kepsek-icon.dim_512x512.png exists and is a 512x512 image derived from ee.png.
frontend/public/assets/generated/shq-kepsek-logo.dim_1024x256.png exists and is a 1024x256 image derived from ee.png.
The new assets visually match the uploaded logo and have a clean/transparent background where applicable.

file_operations.description: Add/replace the square icon asset (512x512) derived from the uploaded ee.png. Ensure output is a PNG at the exact path and filename required by BRANDING.ICON_PATH and the favicon link.
Add/replace the wide logo asset (1024x256) derived from the uploaded ee.png. Ensure output is a PNG at the exact path and filename required by BRANDING.LOGO_PATH.

requirements.summary: Ensure header, login, and dashboards use centralized BRANDING constants for the new logo assets and remove any legacy/hardcoded logo references from these screens.
acceptanceCriteria: AppHeader displays the new square icon via BRANDING.ICON_PATH.
LoginPage displays the new wide logo via BRANDING.LOGO_PATH.
AdminDashboardPage and KepsekDashboardPage show the new logo via the shared AppHeader (no old logo appears anywhere on these pages).
There are no remaining references to the previous logo asset paths in the header, dashboards, or login page components.

file_operations.description: Confirm BRANDING.ICON_PATH and BRANDING.LOGO_PATH point to the new static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are the sole source of truth for logo/icon paths (no legacy paths).
Ensure the header logo uses BRANDING.ICON_PATH/ICON_ALT (no hardcoded or legacy logo paths) and that the rendered icon is the only logo reference in the global header.
Ensure the login page logo uses BRANDING.LOGO_PATH/LOGO_ALT and remove any remaining hardcoded/legacy logo paths or imports.
Verify AdminDashboardPage relies on the shared AppHeader for branding and remove any remaining hardcoded/legacy logo paths that could render on the page.
Verify KepsekDashboardPage relies on the shared AppHeader for branding and remove any remaining hardcoded/legacy logo paths that could render on the page.
Verify the favicon link references the new static icon asset path and remove any legacy favicon/logo references so only the generated icon is used.
